text: Abu Kabir Forensic Institute (L. Greenberg National Institute of Forensic Medicine; ) is the only forensics institute in Israel. It is in Tel Aviv. == Other websites == * the Abu Kabir Forensic Institute at the Israeli Ministry of Health website (Hebrew) Category:Buildings and structures in Tel Aviv Category:Organizations based in Tel Aviv Category:Government of Israel Category:Forensics
title: Abu Kabir Forensic Institute
